author: Marc DeAngelis
title: Researchers use Oura smart rings to predict onset of COVID-19 symptoms
description: Smart ring maker Oura has teamed up with West Virginia University’s Rockefeller Neuroscience Institute to try to predict the spread of COVID-19 in healthcare providers. By combining the wearables with an AI prediction model, the researchers can curre...
